pages.text: $(l:concepts/groves)First conceptualised$() after the gateways to the Fey world were closed, the purpose of the Grove Stone has become entwined with that of the ill-named $(l:crafting/fey_crafter)fey crafter$().$(br2)The stone on its own does nothing, but when empowered

through the ritual of $(l:rituals/Grove Supplication)Grove Supplication$(), energy is collected and stored, amplified, and then dispersed as required.$(br2)$(warning) If a Grove Stone is broken or moved, the Supplication ritual must be performed again.$(br2)$(info) Devices must be placed within 10 blocks of the stone to channel energy.$(br2)In addition to visual effects, there are effects on the world around the stone.

pages.title: In-World Effects
pages.text: If placed in a suitable environment (i.e., with grass nearby), an active Grove Stone will attempt to transform the world around it to better match the wilds of the Fey.$(br2)This process entails the production of grasses, $(l:herbs/introduction)from which herbs can be collected$().$(br2)$(info) In addition, rare flowers such as rose bushes, lilacs, sunflowers and more all have a chance to grow!
